TableView.name: USMC.vwDecendentRecrui.ngOrgs
TableView.userDefinedSQL: SELECT roParent.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS Parent, ro.[ORGANIZATION_ID] as Decendent FROM RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION ro WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP om ON ro.[ORGANIZATION_ID] = om.[CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID] INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roParent ON om.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] = roParent.ORGANIZATION_ID UNION SELECT roParent.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS Parent, ro.[ORGANIZATION_ID] as Decendent FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om2 ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS ro ON om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roParent ON om.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] = roParent.ORGANIZATION_ID UNION SELECT roParent.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS Parent, ro.[ORGANIZATION_ID] as Decendent FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om2 ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om3 ON om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS ro ON om3.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roParent ON om.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] = roParent.ORGANIZATION_ID UNION SELECT roParent.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS Parent, ro.[ORGANIZATION_ID] as Decendent FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om2 ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om3 ON om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om4 ON om3.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om4.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS ro ON om4.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roParent ON om.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] = roParent.ORGANIZATION_ID UNION SELECT roParent.[ORGANIZATION_ID] AS Parent, ro.[ORGANIZATION_ID] as Decendent FROM ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om2 ON om.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om2.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om3 ON om2.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om3.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om4 ON om3.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om4.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN ORGANIZATION_MAP AS om5 ON om4.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = om5.PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS ro ON om5.CHILD_ORGANIZATION_ID = ro.ORGANIZATION_ID INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION AS roParent ON om.[PARENT_ORGANIZATION_ID] = roParent.ORGANIZATION_ID
